Set: Holy Shock increases the initial healing of your next Word of Glory or Light of Dawn by 8%, stacking up to 4 times.

effects.display_string: Set: Holy Shock's healing is increased by 10% and its cooldown is reduced by 10%.
Set: Holy Shock increases the initial healing of your next Word of Glory or Light of Dawn by 8%, stacking up to 4 times.

(2) Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 650,929 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 263,378.
(4) Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Unbound Changeling

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to grant you 4,936 Haste for 12 sec.

description: This strange critter has a rather unsettling habit of staring at you while you eat.

spells.description:
Use: Feed the Coagulum, redirecting 20% of all healing done until 1.4 million healing has been consumed. Once sated, the Coagulum bursts to heal 5 allies for 1 million.

Lingering effluvia causes affected allies' next attacks to deal an additional 25,524 Shadow damage, increased based on overhealing done by the Coagulum. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.
